item.description:
Ok its time to get walking on a good day and watching the sunset atop Case Mountain and before the sunset we can share a glass of wine, grape juice, or whatever you want to bring to drink or eat.

Im bringing some things..(1 bottle of white Zinfindel, some snack stuff) others can bring other things, it is supposed to be a social fun time on the way up at the top as the sun sets and a reward for the walk up..

There is a small bench area up there to put things on...
And that will be mostly by the main dirt road to the top..if we have time then maybe a bit of exploring up there too..

Getting There:
Directions from Hartford:
* Take I-84 E to I-384
* Take Exit 4 off of I-384 (Highland St.)
* From the end of the Exit ramp, right onto Spring St.
* Go about 0.2 mile and make a sharp left and you'll see a small parking lot at the bottom of the hill on your left right after the narrow bridge.
As always look at a map just in case you are comming from a different way and to get a visual look of other roads in the area.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Sunset/Wine and Cheeze Social at Case Mountain Summit
